title: MCP Servers
description: <0>Model Context Protocol</0> enables communication with locally running MCP servers that provide additional tools and resources to extend Roo's capabilities. You can use <1>community-created servers</1> or ask Roo to create new tools specific to your workflow (e.g., "add a tool that fetches the latest npm documentation").

enableToggle.title: Enable MCP servers
enableToggle.description: Enable for Roo to use tools from connected MCP servers. This will give Roo more capabilities. If you don't plan to use these additional tools, disable to save API tokens.

enableServerCreation.title: Enable MCP server creation
enableServerCreation.description: Enable for Roo to help create <1>new</1> custom MCP servers. <0>Learn more about creating servers</0>
enableServerCreation.hint: Tip: To reduce API token costs, disable this setting when you're not asking Roo to create a new MCP server.

learnMoreEditingSettings: Learn more about editing MCP configuration files

networkTimeout.label: Network timeout
networkTimeout.description: Maximum time to wait for server response

deleteDialog.title: Delete MCP server
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the MCP server "{{serverName}}"? This action cannot be undone.
